IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: Measures the quality of the code through various metrics.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Code Review Issues / Total Lines of Code Reviewed) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The number of bugs found per unit of code.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Bugs / Total Lines of Code) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: Measures the amount of work completed in each sprint.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Total Story Points Completed in a Sprint / Number of Sprints

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The frequency of new releases or updates to the system.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Total Number of Deployments / Time Period

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The time taken from making a change request to deploying the change.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Time from Change Request to Deployment

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The number of bugs reported by customers.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Number of Bugs Reported by Customers

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: Measures the amount of work remaining versus the amount of work completed over time.
Measures how often new features are used by customers.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Users Using Feature / Total Number of Users) * 100
